name: TooooClose
description:
Don't run out of space ! Catch a powerup to push out walls. More than 14 unique levels ! Endless runner, try to survive ! Each level require one strategy ! Good luck !

Everything was made by myself on my own within 48 hours. This is also my first ever game jam along with my first ever Compo! So enjoy it and tell us your score in comments ! Peace <3

Instruction:

- Use arrow key to move, nothing else ! 

- Q to Quit. R to restart fast.
